testsuite.name: com.womakerscode.microservicemeetup.controller.RegistrationControllerTest

testcase.name: Should create a registration with success
Should return NOT FOUND when registration doesn't exists
Should return 404 when try to update a non existent registration
Should throw exception when it hadn't have enough date for the test.
Should return resource not found when no registration is found to delete
Should throw exception when try to create a new registration when there is already a registration created.
